pack.tacz.trisdyna.name: §bTRIS-dyna
trisdyna.tris_workbench.desc:
§7TRIS's Workstation, additionally integrated with
precision circuit etching capabilities.
trisdyna.gun.emx_cf007.name: §bCM-117 “Cerberus”
trisdyna.gun.emx_cf007.desc:
Light fighter energy rapid-fire
cannon. Continuous use may overheat
and slow down the firing rate.
trisdyna.gun.emx_cf107.name: §bCM-217M “Roaring”
trisdyna.gun.emx_cf107.desc:
The improved CM-117 features an added
cooler module to suppress heat generation.
trisdyna.gun.cms92.name: §bFTL-XL “White dwarf”
trisdyna.cms92.desc:
Compact energy SMG, firing high-frequency
beams quickly and continuously.
trisdyna.gun.tris_sf7e.name: §bAres SF7E “Ion”
trisdyna.gun.tris_sf7e.desc:
Anti-ship Gatling gun, size 7.
Not meant for human use, but it
encountered cyber-psychotics!
trisdyna.gun.fl3e.name: §bFL-3E “Great Ray”
trisdyna.fl3e.desc:
Handheld mining laser gun, it has a
good brother named 'Plasma Cutter'.
trisdyna.gun.r117_weedy.name: §bFL-117 “Great Tempest”
trisdyna.gun.r117_weedy.desc:
The enlarged version of the Great Ray, it
fires devastating high-energy laser beams.
trisdyna.gun.ch104.name: §bCH-104 “Comet”
trisdyna.ch104.desc:
Built on the frame of a retired sniper
rifle, it is highly favored by veterans.
trisdyna.gun.fl00.name: §bFL-00 “Universal Adapter”
trisdyna.fl00.desc:
The FL series universal tool platform
can adapt to different attachments
for various applications.
trisdyna.gun.fs2000.name: §bFS-2053 “Trigger”
trisdyna.fs2000.desc:
Prototype laser rifle. brief calibration
needed before firing, with a capacitor
for multi-shot energy storage.
trisdyna.gun.fpc211.name: §bFPC-211 “The Marker Nemesis”
trisdyna.fpc211.desc:
Able to effortlessly cut through
rock, steel, and Necromorph skulls.
trisdyna.ammo.emx_b1.name: §bS1-LumaCore Battery
trisdyna.ammo.emx_b2.name: §bS2-UltraFlux Battery
trisdyna.ammo.emx_b3.name: §bS3-Celestial Battery
trisdyna.ammo.emx_b1.tooltip:
§e【Materials/Ammo】
§7High-energy-density power batteries,
cutting-edge technological products
of this century.
trisdyna.attachment.trammo_1.name: §bTRIS-High-Power Capacitor
trisdyna.attachment.trammo_1.tooltip:
Enhance weapon performance by boosting
output power, which will greatly
increase energy consumption.
trisdyna.attachment.trammo_2.name: §bTRIS-Series Capacitor
trisdyna.attachment.trammo_2.tooltip:
Optimize capacitor systems to improve
weapon efficiency and extend battery
life without adverse effects.
trisdyna.attachment.trammo_3.name: §bTRIS-Burst Capacitor
trisdyna.attachment.trammo_3.tooltip:
Significantly extend weapon battery
life by reducing energy supply; can be
seen as a “power-saving mode”.
trisdyna.attachment.sf7e_ammo_1.name: §bS3-Centurion Power Capacitor
trisdyna.attachment.sf7e_ammo_1.tooltip:
Developed by Saint Shield Dynamics, the
C-class military capacitor can supply
emergency power to the SF7E.
trisdyna.attachment.sf7e_ammo_2.name: §bARES-Inferno Power Capacitor
trisdyna.attachment.sf7e_ammo_2.tooltip:
The ARES-Inferno dedicated capacitor powers
the massive anti-ship Gatling gun.
trisdyna.attachment.sf7e_ammo_3.name: §bARES-Ion Power Capacitor
trisdyna.attachment.sf7e_ammo_3.tooltip:
ARES-Ion original capacitor, designed for
energy cannons, has a huge capacitance.
trisdyna.attachment.stock_sf7e_he.name: §bARES->MSHE Cannon Core
trisdyna.attachment.stock_sf7e_he.toolti:
Fire unstable plasma beams, causing
explosions to damage groups
of targets in range.
trisdyna.attachment.stock_sf7e_sp.name: §bARES->DRSP Cannon Core
trisdyna.attachment.stock_sf7e_sp.toolti:
Fire distortion energy beams, significantly
increasing lethality against single
biological targets.
trisdyna.ammo.tris_core.name: §bRahovart Energy Core
trisdyna.ammo.tris_core.tooltip:
§e【Materials/notAmmo】
§7Once a heavy power core for ship-mounted
weapons. Now you often see it on
personal weapons.
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_trls_1.name: §bOptical Focusing Module
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_trls_1.toolti:
Military-grade optical module, more
efficient than industrial ones.
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_trls_2.name: §bHigh-Energy Module
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_trls_2.toolti:
Ore-fracturing module with heat radiation
to ignite targets, effective on
synthetic beings.
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_trls_3.name: §bStanton Fracturing Module
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_trls_3.toolti:
Ship mining drill fracturing
module, powerful, ignites
targets, but heavy.
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris1.name: §bHigh-Energy Particle Module
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris1.tooltip:
Boosts particle beam power,
increasing damage and ignition.
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris2.name: §bHigh-Frequency Particle Module
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris2.tooltip:
Enhances particle beam frequency,
improving energy penetration.
trisdyna.attachment.sight_tris_eos.name: §b“Demogorgon-Eclipse” Sight
trisdyna.attachment.sight_tris_eos.toolt:
TRIS-adapted Demogorgon scopes with color
scheme and energy weapon display.
trisdyna.attachment.sight_tris_eosl.name: §b“Demogorgon-Nova” Sight
trisdyna.attachment.sight_tris_eosl.tool:
TRIS-adapted Demogorgon scopes with color
scheme and energy weapon display.
trisdyna.attachment.grip_shimmer.name: §b“Shimmer” Tactical laser
trisdyna.attachment.grip_shimmer.tooltip:
TRIS Light Tactical Laser,
lightweight and reliable.
trisdyna.attachment.sight_aurora.name: §b“PolarDay” Sight
trisdyna.attachment.sight_aurora.tooltip:
An integrated scope suitable
for medium-range combat.
trisdyna.attachment.grip_barrier.name: §b“Barrier” Energy Barrier
trisdyna.attachment.grip_barrier.tooltip:
The integrated energy shield
looks sufficiently safe.
trisdyna.attachment.sight_antares.name: §b“Antares” Sight
trisdyna.attachment.sight_antares.toolti:
A detachable scope suitable for
long-range combat.
trisdyna.gun.iras.name: §bIRA-S “Gravastar”
trisdyna.iras.desc:
Heavy Assault Shotgun Powered
by Swappable Battery Packs
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris1.name: §bTRIS Modular Upgrade
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris1.tooltip:
Improve Core System Components
to Enhance Ergonomics.
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris2.name: §bTRIS Overclocking Upgrade
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris2.tooltip:
Add Power Supply Lines to
Slightly Increase Weapon Damage.
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris_sl1.name: §b“Phantom Sound” suppressor
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris_sl1.tool:
Boosts particle beam power,
increasing damage and ignition.
§8Suppressed firearm with chip integration
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris_sl2.name: §b“Sound Stealth” suppressor
trisdyna.attachment.muzzle_tris_sl2.tool:
Enhances particle beam frequency,
improving energy penetration.
§8Suppressed firearm with chip integration
trisdyna.attachment.sight_emx_aps_zh1.to:
New Era Cyber Christmas Tree
§a【Requires EMX-Arms Pack】
trisdyna.gun.cms92x.name: §bFTL-MR “Black Dwarf”
trisdyna.cms92x.desc:
Lightweight white dwarfs
can dual-wield shoot.
trisdyna.gun.rc.name: §bFire Platform “Reverse Collapse”
trisdyna.ammo.emx_b6.name: §b“S6-Tianshu” Reactor Core
trisdyna.ammo.emx_b6.tooltip:
A reactor core that is minuscule
in size yet fully functional.
trisdyna.gun.omerta.name: §bFTS-L “Omertà”
trisdyna.ammo.emx_s10.name: §aTyphoon-X Railgun Projectile
trisdyna.gun.s10dmd.name: §bIdris D10-MD “destroyer”
trisdyna.s10dmd.desc:
A scaled-down S10 naval gun. Its
prototype is extensively used on
the pirates' Idris frigates.
trisdyna.attachment.sight_mfd.name: §b“AEGIS·Vanguard” MFD
trisdyna.attachment.sight_mfd.tooltip:
A flight control display salvaged from a crashed
ship. With it, everyone has the chance
to become an Idris owner.
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris_st1.name: §bTRIS CHK Replica stock
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris_st1.toolt: Replica stock with an upgrade module.
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris_st2.name: §bTRIS M4SS Replica stock
trisdyna.attachment.stock_tris_st2.toolt: Replica stock with an upgrade module.
trisdyna.attachment.laser_shimmer.name: §b“Shimmer” laser
trisdyna.attachment.laser_shimmer.toolti: TRISLightweight tactical laser, portable and reliable.
trisdyna.attachment.sight_neutron.name: §b“Neutron” Red Dot Sight
